biotools.summary:
Inferring subgroup specific driver genes from heterogeneous cancer samples via subspace learning with subgroup indication.

Developer: Jianing Xi xjn@nwpu.edu.cn.

Instructions to DriverSub (version 1.0.0).

After the raw data are loaded, the script ./GenerateInputData.m with function ./bin/P02_GenerateMutData.m can generate the mutation matrix of BRCA and BLCA as ./InputData/D01_brca.mat and ./InputData/D02_blca.mat. The two generated .mat files are the input data of DriverSub
